name: The Adventures of SpudMate
description:
This is a minimalist colour pallet platformer game, you're the potato, you're going to the right. Your controls are A+D +SpaceBar (the big thingie at the bottom of the keyboard).The World may tilt as you navigate the floor,try not to run on your face too much.All trees are your friend, so try not breaking too many of them.You are welcome to defy gravity with cliff hanging stunts.

Do enjoy being the potato guy, Full potato guy experience will be available in March 2016
